Texts.Chs: 使用鞣制皮加工而成的护具。^cyan;套装加成：速度+5%，暴击几率+5%，击退抵抗+10%。位于葱郁与沙漠特征的星球时，击退抵抗+10%，能量值上限+5%^reset;
Texts.Eng: Durable boiled leather armor. ^cyan;Set Bonus^reset; : ^green;+10% Knockback Resist^reset;, ^green;+5% Speed^reset;, ^green;+5% Crit Chance^reset;, ^green;Additional 5% energy and 10% knockback resistance^reset; on Lush and Desert biomes
